Package no.hiof.larseknu.game

Class PlayerCharacter

java.lang.Object
no.hiof.larseknu.game.PlayerCharacter
public class PlayerCharacter extends Object
PlayerCharacter is a class that represent a playable character in the game. Holds information about the name, nickName, level, noob status, health and current weapons.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PlayerCharacter()
    Sets a default name for the PlayerCharacter, sets isNoob to true, level to 1, health to 30 and generates a list of starting weapons.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerCharacter

      public PlayerCharacter()
      Sets a default name for the PlayerCharacter, sets isNoob to true, level to 1, health to 30 and generates a list of starting weapons.

  • Method Details

    • sleep

      public void sleep()
      Increases the health of the character within a random range between 1 and 99. Should be called when the PlayerCharacter is sleeping.

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int damage)
      Decreases the PlayerCharacter health with the set damage, down to a minimum of 0.
      Parameters:
      damage - the amount of damage the PlayerCharacter takes

      public void setNickName(String nickName) throws no.hiof.larseknu.game.ProfanityException
      Sets the nickName of the PlayerCharacter.
      Parameters:
      nickName - the nickName to be set
      Throws:
      no.hiof.larseknu.game.ProfanityException - if the nickName is a bad word
